description:
go.exp/collate: make collate package and sub-packages use locale package.
After this change these packages can be moved to go.text.

messages.text:

go.exp/collate: make collate package and sub-packages use locale package.
After this change these packages can be moved to go.text.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
